topic.title: Fan location rules for HP BladeSystem c3000 Enclosure
topic.keywords: fan rules HP BladeSystem c3000 Enclosure

content.p: The HP BladeSystem c3000 Enclosure ships with four HP Active Cool Fans and supports up to six fans. Install fans based on the number of server blades installed in the enclosure. Install fan blanks in any unused fan bays.
Fan bays 2, 4, 5, and 6 are used to support a maximum of four devices located in device bays 1, 2, 5, and 6.
All fan bays are used to support a maximum of eight devices in any device bay.
